ygData.subject: RE: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow... if this is any indication of the stat boosts we can expect from the rest of the pieces, it looks like they got it right.  I will never understand why we
ygData.messageBody:
Wow... if this is any indication of the stat boosts we can expect from the
rest of the pieces, it looks like they got it right. I will never
understand why we have/had INT and WIS boosts on our PoF armor.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jason Osborne [mailto:jasono@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 11, 1999 9:49 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] New Lambent Armor stats
>
>
> From: Jason Osborne <jasono@...>
>
> This was posted on one of the message boards at the concert hall, so I
> thought I'd share. Personally, I like it a lot. Better than
> Rubi, better
> than crafted, and oh so hard to acquire. ;-)
>
> Lambent Greaves
> 13 AC
> 1 cha
> 5 agi
>
> Lambent Bracer
> 9 AC
> 1 cha
> 4 str
>
> Laena, lvl 23 Bard of E'ci
>
